name: Dynamic Country Club
overview:
Dynamic Country Club is a golf simulation game featuring an original course with a full 18 holes, as well as several standard modes including Tournament, Stroke Play for up to four players, Match Play for up to two players, and a four-player cooperative mode called Foursome.

Outside of the main game modes, there is a so-called Warming Up mode where the player can pick a hole to practice in a variety of ways, including practicing shots from numerous locations on and off the fairway. In addition, there is also a dictionary mode where a wide range of golf terms are explained in easy-to-understand Japanese.
